name: New Pong
description:
I made this game as a school summer project and it turned out very good.  the game is pretty much just pong but you can change almost everything in the options and you can rotate the paddle too

when you first open the game go to options to change the background color first then go to the other setting and change them to what ever you want but i want to warn you there is a bug where if you set the option value to the max it puts the value to zero

Controls (player 1/player 2)

Move up w/up arrow

Move down s/down arrow

Rotate left a/left arrow

Rotate right d/right arrow

Start game Space

Main menu ESC (it also resets the game)
